sentences.sContent: I'm afraid his hope won't come true easily.
sentences.sContent_eng: I'm afraid his hope won't come true easily.

sentences.sContent: His wish to study music has come true at last.
sentences.sContent_eng: His wish to study music has come true at last.
sentences.sCn: 他学习音乐的愿望这回算实现了。

sentences.sContent: If he returns, all of my wildest dreams would come true!
sentences.sContent_eng: If he returns, all of my wildest dreams would come true!
sentences.sCn: 如果他回来，我所有的最疯狂的梦想都将实现！
